product_name: BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter - Fits Chicco Seats
long_description: Designed for Chicco infant car seats, this BOB Infant car seat adapter lets you transport your infant from car to BOB stroller while infant remain in the car seat. Fits Chicco Key Fit(TM) and Key Fit(TM) 30 infant car seats. Easy to install, and remove and folds with the stroller; restraint belt secures infant car seat in place. Works with current single-child BOB strollers, including Revolution SE, Revolution CE, Stroller Strides, Sport Utility Stroller and Ironman models. Because of the higher center of gravity it creates, the BOB Infant Car Seat Adapter is intended for walking use only. BOB recommends that you consult with your pediatrician regarding the suitability of stroller use with your child as each child develops at a different rate.
short_description: Designed for Chicco infant car seats, this BOB Infant car seat adapter lets you transport your infant from car to BOB stroller while infant remain in the car seat.
